Universidade do Vale do Rio dos Sinos

skills.label: HTML/CSS
skills.description: I understand HTML fundamentals, document structure, metadata and the proper usage of semantic markup and *page* structure elements in conformity to W3C specifications, as well as  ttributes and their correct implementation. I am familiar with important accessibility standards such as the use of semantic HTML, heading hierarchy, *ARIA attributes* etc. I can easily implement user input features such as forms and input.
